code: custom_table <- function(data, search = "") {   DT::datatable(     data,     escape = FALSE,     rownames = NULL,     options = list(       # fti =  f: filter, t: table, i: information       dom = "fti", search = list(search = search)     )   ) } by_concept <- filter(pick, concept == "Datasets available by data()")  by_concept |> custom_table(search = "car") by_package <- filter(pick, package == "tools")  by_package |> custom_table(search = "Utilities")
